name: @naviagent/aisuckhoe-website
description: AI sức khoẻ - Trợ lý sức khoẻ thông minh mọi gia đình

scripts.build: cd payload && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next build
scripts.dev: cd payload && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next dev
scripts.dev:prod: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf .next && pnpm build && pnpm start
scripts.generate:importmap: cd payload && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation payload generate:importmap
scripts.generate:types: cd payload && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation payload generate:types
scripts.lint: cd payload && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd payload && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next lint --fix
scripts.start: cd payload && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next start
scripts.reinstall: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf node_modules && rm pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm --ignore-workspace install
scripts.website:build: cd website && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next build
scripts.website:dev: cd website && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next dev
scripts.website:dev:prod: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf .next && pnpm website:build && pnpm website:start
scripts.website:start: cd website && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next start
